content: Perfect. You wrote exactly what I’ve always wanted to say to my co-workers but couldn’t express it. I wish I could send your text to them — lol. But indeed, yes, I’ve been working here, in the same environment, for the past 8 years, and I feel that I lost 40% of my intelligence over that time. It may have something to do with what you wrote, since the interruption level is around 7432, hehe.
